meanings.definition: Resembling a basket in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The woven chair had a basketlike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The picnic basket had a basketlike handle for easy carrying.
meanings.sent3: The basketlike hat made everyone giggle at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a basketlike nest of curls after a windy day.
meanings.sent5: The clouds formed a basketlike shape in the sky, resembling a giant woven bowl.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a basket.
meanings.sent1: The basketlike container was perfect for storing fruits.
meanings.sent2: The woven bag had a basketlike texture that was pleasing to touch.
meanings.sent3: The basketlike behavior of the squirrel amused the park visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a basketlike quality, warm and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The room had a cozy, basketlike feel with all the woven decorations.
